name: Bumper Bear
description:
Try to beat down your enemy bears and be the strongest one!

Bumper Bear is an intriguing game with easy play rule. When your bear meets other bumper bear on the playground, you should knock with each other and knock them into the water.

Knock down as many opponents bear as you can and you will become bigger and bigger, stronger and stronger!

Play now and be the best fierce bear!

Features:
Free to play
Easy to control
Exquisite visuals and figure design
Relax and exciting
Challenging levels with different backgrounds
